markdownRemark.html:
Project URL, Github

Problem

  • I want to see which hawker centres are open and
  • search UI for NPM registry and be able to search with text inputs.
  • I want to list out the results of the search.
  • I want to see details like name of the package, author and package updated date.
  • I want to be able to route to a separate page so that the users can view details of the selected package.

Solution

Stack

  • Programming Languages: Typescript (Javascript)
  • Frontend: NextJS(React), Leaflet
  • Backend: Express, Cheerio, Puppeteer
  • Misc: Axios, Cors
